ValidationRule.description: Payment currency could not be empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(TEXT(Payment_Currency__c)) && RecordType.Name = 'Voucher' && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Comp_Approval_Status__c, 'Draft')) && OR (ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Comp_Approval_Status__c), 'Draft') ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Claim_Status__c, 'Draft')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Claim_Status__c, 'Cancelled'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Payment currency could not be empty
